Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_2440: how to view a directory's permission
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_2440: $ stat -c %a /
755
$ stat -c %A /
drwxr-xr-x
$ stat -c %a /tmp
1777
$ stat -c %A /tmp
drwxrwxrwt

Explanations about Options.-c:
use the specified FORMAT instead of the default; output a newline after each use of
 FORMAT
